recipesJson.name: Layerz - Purple Mango
recipesJson.author: thefogvlog
recipesJson.description:
We spoke about it in this video : https://youtu.be/nDlyaa2zQ0M

This is not a complete recipe, just a layer - but there is tons of things you can do with it. Its a delicious full bodied juicy mango - with a purple black currant finish. Oddly these two fruit belong together. You are going to need a smidge of Super Sweet to in this combo - trust me. It works very well. 

Potential applications:
Ice cream - Perhaps something like LB Vanilla Ice Cream
Cocktail - look for a white rum, or vodka base
Ice Lolly - Bang some ws23 in here, and you are going to have a party
